original_text: So now you must accept that you are guilty. You have done such wicked things that your sisters think that they are good people. You have done much worse things than they ever did. I must punish you even more than I punished them. So you should be ashamed and you should accept your punishment. You have made your sisters seem to be righteous.
korean_text: 네가 네 형과 아우를 유리하게 판단하였은즉 너도 네 수치를 담당할지니라 네가 그들보다 더욱 가증한 죄를 범하므로 그들이 너보다 의롭게 되었나니 네가 네 형과 아우를 의롭게 하였은즉 너는 놀라며 네 수치를 담당할지니라

sentences.original_text: So now you must accept that you are guilty.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 이제 너는 네가 유죄하다는 것을 받아들여야 한다.

sentences.original_text: You have done such wicked things
that your sisters think that they are good people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 너의 자매들은 자신들이 선한 사람이라고 생각한다.

sentences.original_text: You have done much worse things
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 훨씬 더 나쁜 일들을 했다.

sentences.original_text: I must punish you even more
and you should accept your punishment.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 네 벌을 받아들여야 한다.

sentences.original_text: You have made your sisters seem to be righteous.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 너의 자매들이 의로워 보이게 만들었다.
